title: Update landing page login sentence to ICP Identity

requirements.text: In the landing page features section, replace the sentence “Достъп с ICP wallet, без имейл и без регистрация” with “Достъп с ICP Identity, без имейл и без регистрация”, and do not change any other text, styling, layout, or behavior.

quotes: На началната страница да се замени изречението “Достъп с ICP wallet, без имейл и без регистрация” с “Достъп с ICP Identity, без имейл и без регистрация”. Не променяй нищо друго.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx` no longer contains the exact substring “Достъп с ICP wallet, без имейл и без регистрация”.
`frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx` contains the exact substring “Достъп с ICP Identity, без имейл и без регистрация” in the same location (the “Влез анонимно” feature card).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, and `frontend/src/components/ui/*`) must not be edited.
Do not modify any other homepage content beyond the single specified sentence replacement.
nonGoals: No translation or copy edits to any other Bulgarian text on the landing page.
No authentication or Internet Identity behavior changes.
